subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: When the United States Anti-Doping Agency told Lance Armstrong that he was facing charges so serious that he could lose his Tour de France titles, they understood that a legal battle was ahead.
snippet: When the United States Anti-Doping Agency told Lance Armstrong that he was facing charges so serious that he could lose his Tour de France titles, they understood that a legal battle was ahead.
